Class Filter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.filters.Filter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicFilter, FilterCollection, FilterDome, FilterMyWorkers, FilterOtherWorkers, FilterUnmovedMyWorkers, FilterUpByTwo
public abstract class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Class that defines the model for a Filter class Defines @see filter Ovverrides equals method so that two objects that have the same class are the same

    • filter

      public abstract void filter​(Position startingPosition, java.util.List<Position> positionsToFilter, Board gameBoard)
      Modifies the list based on the method implementation The method implementation is "determined" by its class name The method can use other parameters from the actual class
      Parameters:
      startingPosition - position from which the filterage starts
      positionsToFilter - List of positions that needs to be filtered
      gameBoard - provides information about a certain position using it's getters
